name: atom-image-paste
description: Pastes images from your clipboard into atom. Supports various filetypes and custom image directories.

use_subfolder.title: Save images in subfolder
use_subfolder.description: If checked the images will be saved in a subfolder. You can either set your own folder or choose from the presets

use_selected_text.title: Use selected text as file name
use_selected_text.description: If checked the currently selected text will be the filename, along with the current date
